### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.2ndswing.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.2ndswing.com%2F) ### Comment > pop-up still visible on 2ndswing.com with Adguard enabled ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/n7w4m796erkwsww4okw8o4w0sw0c0ckfd6nqw2scns.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.17.3.2020 release System version: | `MacOS 26.0.1 (Build 25A362)` Browser: | Safari Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:

**Browser API**:
Block Push API,
Block Location API,
Block Java

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `System`

`AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://www.google.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com%2F) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=mac&product_version=2.17.3.2020+release&system_version=MacOS+26.0.1+%28Build+25A362%29&browser=safari&filters=2.3.4.17.18.19.20.21.22.122.123.207.225.241.249&dns_servers=System&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29&dns.filters=AdGuard%2520DNS%2520filter&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=true&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=true&stealth.location=true&stealth.java=true&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&referrer=https%253A%252F%252Fwww.google.com%252F&scheme_version=3&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=2000)

issue.title: jp.motorsport.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [NSFW] [https://jp.motorsport.com/f1/news/all-new-racing-bulls-driver-line-up-predicted-for-2026-in-hunt-for-next-max-verstappen/10766507/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fjp.motorsport.com%2Ff1%2Fnews%2Fall-new-racing-bulls-driver-line-up-predicted-for-2026-in-hunt-for-next-max-verstappen%2F10766507%2F) ### Comment > ブロックされてサイトを閲覧出来ない ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/6w9izt6b4hs0w8ss408so88wg480w0clb5g0b9uv1c.png?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.0 (5225) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26100.0` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `AdGuard DNS Filter`, `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Language-specific:
AdGuard German,
AdGuard Japanese,
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese,
AdGuard Chinese,
EasyList Italy,
List-KR Custom filters: | `User rules (url: none)` Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Assistant (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/assistant/4.3/assistant.user.js)`
`AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)`
`AdGuard Popup Blocker (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://jp.motorsport.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fjp.motorsport.com%2F) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=win&product_version=7.22.0+%285225%29&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.26100.0&browser=chrome&filters=2.3.6.7.9.109.224.227&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns_servers=System&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Assistant%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fassistant%252F4.3%252Fassistant.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%252C%250AAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fpopup-blocker%252F2.5%252Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&dns.filters=AdGuard%2520DNS%2520Filter%252C%250AUser%2520rules%2520%28url%253A%2520none%29&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.flash=false&stealth.java=false&stealth.strip_url=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&referrer=https%253A%252F%252Fjp.motorsport.com%252F&win.wfp=true&license_type=paid&scheme_version=2&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=0&dns.fallback_mode=System&stealth.disable_windows_recall=true)
